Tracker Hatuba:
Undead, which must be destroyed, wanders in the vicinity of the Cursed Village.
It Is The Specter Of The Guillotine, The Devil Bat, Brat, The Headless Ghost, The Monstrous Zombies, The Bone Collector, Animator Bone, Bone Assassin, Bone Cleaner, Masticator Bones, Bone Scavenger, The Caster Of Bones, Bone Puppeteer, Collector Of Skulls, Animator Skulls, Lord Requiem, Requiem Priest, The Beast, Requiem, The Phantom Of The Traitor, The Ghost Of The Warrior Rebel, Ghost, The Heads Of Rebels, Soldiers, Vampires, Vampire Mage, Adept Vampires, Warrior, Vampire, Magician, Vampire, Master Vampire, Vampire.
The gravestone can be found in the South of the Cursed Village.
